name: Hisshou Pachinko*Pachi-Slot Kouryaku Series Portable Vol. 1: Shinseiki Evangelion Tamashii no Kiseki
overview: Hisshou Pachinko*Pachi-Slot Kouryaku Series Portable Vol. 1: Shinseiki Evangelion Tamashii no Kiseki is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2010.
